name: Welcome To Dark Side
description:
Honestly we cannot continue to achieve everything. Let's just get through the obstacles on our way!

This game I have always wanted to create. Pass the difficult stages and collect the jewels and the magic drink.

Very easy control. Smooth and fun game play for people who love the challenge.

 The best challenge game you'll find in the mobile store so far.

Features:
- Difficult stages, the difficulty begins from the fourth stage.
- 9+ stages waiting for you to explore.
- A new experience every time you cross an obstacle.
- The game will raise your focus to the highest limits!
- Many features you'll find in the game.

Noticeable:
* Do not lose your temper and do not despair when you pass obstacles.
